bug.short_desc: Control widget lingering with canvas layout and maxWidth/maxHeight

long_desc.thetext:
In the example[1], the green block has equal top and bottom layout properties. When the browser window gets resized, the block lingers to the top; that means, top offset remains constant, while bottom offset varies according to maxHeight widget property. (The block would also linger to the left should left layout property and maxWidth widget property be set.)
It would be nice to have an ability to control/reverse this behavior. This could be useful, for example, to make a qx.ui.window.Window stick to lower/right corner inside a qx.ui.window.Desktop, and be shrunk upon browser window resize.
[1] http://demo.qooxdoo.org/4.1/demobrowser/#layout~Canvas_MinMaxSizes.html
